data.title: Albert Einstein with who is perhaps his wife, Elsa Einstein
data.meta_description: Photograph of Albert Einstein with who is perhaps his wife, Elsa Einstein, [s.d.]. Einstein can be seen standing at left wearing a suit and tie. He has a moustache, and is looking down at a paper he is holding with both hands. The paper has writing covering the back of it. His hair is frizzy and unkempt, and a pen can be seen in his right jacket pocket. A woman wearing a jacket with leaf patterns along the sleeves and back can be seen standing to the right. She wears a cap on her head that covers her ears, while her left hand is also holding the paper that Einstein is looking at. A ring can be seen on her wedding finger. Trees can be seen in the background.
